name: 1 - Name plate data matches IFC engineering schedule
2 - Confirm all shipping stops, bracing and packaging are removed
3 - Equipment installed as per IFC drawings
4 - Equipment installed on vibration isolators – Waffle Pad / Springs
5 - Is Fan Internally Isolated on Springs (if not has a flexible connection been installed)
6 - Traps & drains, flow from trays with unit operational.
7 - Final filters installed with temporary filter media covering filters
10 - Control valves - direction of flow & size
1 - Check materials used are specified or approved.
2 - Check that materials are clean & free from damage.
3 - Check that cables/wires are correctly sized.
4 - Check that all cables are adequately supported.
5 - Check that all cables are suitably tied down.
6 - Check that all fixings are adequately tightened down.
7 - Check that segregation is provided where required.
8 - Check that mechanical protection of cables is provided where necessary.
10 - Tick off below for each floor
1 - Storage area for all duct shall be clean, dry and exposure to dust minimized
2 - Working area is clean and dry and protected from the elements
3 - Internal surfaces of the uninsulated ductwork shall be wiped to remove excess dust.
4 - Duct delivered to site has Plastic Protecting on all ends from duct and debris
5 - Before Installation of individual sections of duct, each
6 - Piece is inspected and are free from all debris
7 - Ductwork will be inspected after installation and cleaned/sealed where required
8 - Open ends on completed ductwork and overnight work in
10 - Duct Position as per IFC Drawings
11 - Duct supports as per Australian Standards
15 - Duct Lagging – State whether Internal / External Insulation
17 - VCD shafts marked with blade position
20 - Flexible Ductwork installed as per Australian Standards
21 - Access Panels Installed as per IFC Drawings
1 - Nameplate data conforms to IFC schedule
5 - All transit bolts, straps and packaging removed
1 - Materials conform to specification and damage free
3 - Insulation glued to blocks where required
6 - Metal sheathing sealed with silicone where exposed to weather
